name: Living Artwork Bird
description:
The game is based on a Chinese Traditional Painting. A bird standing on the branch, with a delicious apple on the tree. Players are able to control the bird, defend the tree from the attack of enemies. Use the beak of the bird as a weapon to catch the bees. 

Press WASD to control the bird,    press Space to interact with the scene,   press Z to remove branch that blocks your way.
